extension.author: Dang Thuc Dam
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2019 Ossolution Co.LTD. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Displays a list of countries/states/cities in OS Property system

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable or div.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: list_type
field.label: List type (Countries/States/Cities)
field.description: Please select data type that the module will list. States or Cities

field.name: num_cols
field.label: Number columns
field.description: The number of columns will be shown

field.name: country
field.label: Select country
field.description: Select country that states of it will be shown in the module

field.name: hasproperties
field.label: List states/ cities that have properties already
field.description: Do you want to show states that have properties are belong to it

field.name: stateIds
field.label: State IDs
field.description: In case you want to show Cities, please enter State IDs - separated by colon. For example: 1,2,3,4. StateIDs can be found at Back-End > OS Property > Manage States

field.name: itemid
field.label: ItemID
field.description: Please enter Menu Item ID that will be used in links
